meanings.definition: A large, black bird with a loud, harsh call.
meanings.sent1: The ravens flew across the sky, cawing loudly.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of ravens perched on the tree branches.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raven stole shiny objects to decorate its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as dark as a raven's wing, flowing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silhouette of the raven against the full moon was haunting.

meanings.definition: To seize or prey upon something eagerly or greedily.
meanings.sent1: The hungry predator ravens its prey in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She ravens through the pile of sweets, looking for her favorite.
meanings.sent3: The kids ravens the snacks at the party, leaving none for others.
meanings.sent4: Time ravens away at our memories, leaving only fragments behind.
meanings.sent5: The storm ravens through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
